      • isApplicable

        Check if this serializer can handle values of the given type.

        Returns:

      • deserialize

        Object deserialize(TypeToken<?> type,
                 ConfigurationNode value)
                   throws ObjectMappingException
        Deserialize an object required to be of a given type from the given configuration node
        Parameters:
        type - The type of return value required
        value - The node containing serialized data
        Returns:
        An object
        Throws:
        ObjectMappingException - If the presented data is somehow invalid
